question: Ex Vajra Prahar 2019 is the joint military exercise between India & which country?
explanation: The 10th edition of the joint military exercise \"Vajra Prahar\" between India and the United States gas started at the Joint Base Lewis-McChord (JBLM) in Seattle on October 13 & will last till October 28. It  is a Special Forces joint training exerciseconducted alternately in India and the US.
